Hope: make it easy for leetcode to study & easy
Hope: can collect & record the video explanation of leetcode
Hope: users can contribute their own code & video explanation.
This package: easyleetcode
It is based on Python fastapi as server、Vue.js as client
For Python programmers to learn from leetcode fast
You can run and write your code online on the web
Support markdown notes
Python Code location: easyleetcode / leetcodes
Markdown Notes location: easyleetcode / leetcodes_ m
Our title : 新蕾Python
Because of my girlfriend's support, let I insisted on doing this event for Python education
So 新and 蕾 it's short for our name
